descr: Doing research on efficient noise suppression using Deep Learning; part of CONVOLVE, an EU Horizon research project for the seamless design of smart edge processors
External rotation within the graduate program; project on efficient Speaker Identification and Verification using Deep Learning
Graduate program in Audio Engineering, focusing on Deep Learning projects in the sound domain

Algorithms aiding sound editing professionals:
- Deep learning models for sound categorization
- DSP algorithms for channel selection and phase offset removal

Research on HRTF individualization:
- Deep learning models for pinna images and HRTF autoencoding
- Written and collaborated on 4 conference papers and a journal article
- Achieved 2° and 5° improvement in vertical and horizontal localization
System administrator for machine learning workstation

Mixed-reality boxing game:
- Audio reproduction firmware features on ARM Cortex-M
- Time-series data analysis for gesture recognition

Lab assistant for C++ course:
- Assisted class of 100+ students during lab hours and online

IoT platform for data logging and analysis:
- Configured and deployed custom ARM and x86 SBCs
- Daemons for collection of sensor data and diagnostics
- Designed storage backend and frontend

Automated searchlight with stabilization and remote tracking:
- Hardware abstraction layers for external sensors and actuators
- Evaluated multiple data fusion algorithms and IMUs
- Control loop for BLDC motors with sub-degree accuracy

New website for the *Copenhagen Business Confucius Institute*:
- Design and implementation of ad-hoc CMS based on Django and migration of old content from Drupal
- Setting up of hosting, social media integration, and analytics; authoring of documentation and usage guide

Various tasks:
- Configuration and testing of hardware devices
- Personalization of Magento-based web shop platform

Final project: *A hybrid approach to structural modeling of individualized HRTFs*
- Synthesis of head-related transfer functions from ear images
- Developed solution based on deep learning and DSP

2<sup>nd</sup> semester project: *Deep learning for speech enhancement*
- Implemented and evaluated models (LSTM, TCN) for speech denoising

1<sup>st</sup> semester project: *Sound Morphing with Variational Autoencoders*
- Trained generative models (VAE) for sound synthesis

Final project: *UAVCAN-enabled indoor positioning system for unmanned vehicles*
- Implemented ToF-based triangulation on Cortex-M

Further projects:
- GPS and environmental data collection and visualization (Java, R Shiny, C++)
- Designed and programmed a line-following robot
- Integrated solution for unmanned shop (Java, MySQL, C)

Collection of the *VIKING HRTF dataset* v2:
- Manufacturing of silicone pinnae
- Acquisition and post processing of acousting measurements
